analyzed_text: It looks like you have a slightly different version of makepkg that I do (mine accepts empty pkgnames -- this is just a temporary PKGBUILD use to retrieve some info from makepkg.conf (which can be in various places) without having to parse it).  What did you install Arch from?..In any case, I just pushed a fix that should work even in your case.  Please give it a try.  For me django-braces appears correctly packaged (your usage is correct).
